Text: Really appreciating all of these classic Vertigo uploads! I lost about half of my old collection to burglars (with taste, apparently), so it feels great to read them again.

Thanks Proteus11. Sorry to hear about the loss, but you'll be happy to know I plan on upping a whole lot more of the 90s Vertigo stuff. Whenever I come across something in the collection that isn't already here, I'll add it.
